title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually, and ShiftLeft is executed, the text moves. However, it is not clear how this behavior is specified. In the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left up to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). In any case, it is confusing if there is a stray space because it is unclear why the text won't shift.
